text: Podkamennaya Tunguska () is a rural locality (a village) in Borsky Selsoviet of Turukhansky District in Krasnoyarsk Krai, Russia,Law #10-4765 located at the confluence of the Podkamennaya Tunguska and Yenisei Rivers on the Yenisei River's side opposite to the settlement of Bor and the Podkamennaya Tunguska Airport. Within the framework of municipal divisions, the village is a part of Borsky Rural Settlement in Turukhansky Municipal District. ==References== Category:Rural localities in Krasnoyarsk Krai Category:Turukhansky District
title: Podkamennaya Tunguska (rural locality)
